requests.tests:
var jsonData = JSON.parse(responseBody)
tests["Status is ok"] = jsonData.status === 'ok'
requests.name: API status
requests.description: Basically just a ping, to check if the API is alive.

requests.tests:
var jsonData = JSON.parse(responseBody)
tests["Session Token present"] = jsonData.token.payload.SessionToken !== undefined
postman.setEnvironmentVariable("token", jsonData.token.token)
postman.setEnvironmentVariable("profileURL", jsonData.$links.filter(link => link.subject === 'https://github.com/ResourcefulHumans/staRHs-models#Profile')[0].href)
postman.setEnvironmentVariable("staRHsStatusURL", jsonData.$links.filter(link => link.subject === 'https://github.com/ResourcefulHumans/staRHs-models#StaRHsStatus')[0].href)
tests["Profile link present"] = postman.getEnvironmentVariable("profileURL") !== undefined
tests["StaRHs Status link present"] = postman.getEnvironmentVariable("staRHsStatusURL") !== undefined
requests.name: Login with username and password

requests.tests:
var jsonData = JSON.parse(responseBody)
postman.setEnvironmentVariable("nextURL", jsonData.$links.filter(link => link.rel === 'next')[0].href)
requests.name: fetch received staRHs

requests.tests:
var jsonData = JSON.parse(responseBody)
postman.setEnvironmentVariable("receivedStaRHsURL", jsonData.$links.filter(link => link.rel === 'received-staRHs')[0].href)
postman.setEnvironmentVariable("sharedStaRHsURL", jsonData.$links.filter(link => link.rel === 'shared-staRHs')[0].href)
postman.setEnvironmentVariable("colleaguesURL", jsonData.$links.filter(link => link.rel === 'colleagues')[0].href)
postman.setEnvironmentVariable("shareURL", jsonData.$links.filter(link => link.rel === 'share-staRH')[0].href)

tests["Received StaRHs link present"] = postman.getEnvironmentVariable("receivedStaRHsURL") !== undefined
tests["Shared StaRHs link present"] = postman.getEnvironmentVariable("sharedStaRHsURL") !== undefined
tests["Colleagues link present"] = postman.getEnvironmentVariable("colleaguesURL") !== undefined
tests["Share link present"] = postman.getEnvironmentVariable("shareURL") !== undefined
requests.name: profile

requests.tests:
var jsonData = JSON.parse(responseBody)
postman.setEnvironmentVariable("statusURL", jsonData.$links.filter(link => link.subject === 'https://github.com/ResourcefulHumans/starhs-api-proxy-aws-lambda#Status')[0].href)
postman.setEnvironmentVariable("loginURL", jsonData.$links.filter(link => link.subject === 'https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7519')[0].href)

tests["Status link present"] = postman.getEnvironmentVariable("statusURL") !== undefined
tests["Login link present"] = postman.getEnvironmentVariable("loginURL") !== undefined
